entry.value: SELECT id FROM locations WHERE country = '${country}' AND state = '${state}' AND city = '${city}'
SELECT id FROM locations WHERE country = '${country}' AND state = '${state}' AND city = '${city}'

WITH shape_data AS ( -- Subquery to get the shape_id for '${shape}' or insert it if it doesn't exist INSERT INTO shapes (name) SELECT '${shape}' WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM shapes WHERE name = '${shape}' ) RETURNING id ) -- Insert the row into the 'reports' table INSERT INTO reports (sight_date, shape_id, location_id) SELECT '${sight_date}', COALESCE((SELECT id FROM shape_data), (SELECT id FROM shapes WHERE name = '${shape}')), 0;
CREATE TABLE locations ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, country TEXT, state TEXT, city TEXT, latitude DOUBLE PRECISION, longitude DOUBLE PRECISION );

entry.value: INSERT INTO locations (country, state, city, latitude, longitude) VALUES ('${country}', '${state}', '${city}', ${latitude}, ${longitude});
